text: Mikadotrochus is a genus of sea snails, marine gastropod mollusks in the family Pleurotomariidae, the slit snails. ==Species== Species within the genus Mikadotrochus include: * Mikadotrochus beyrichii (Hilgendorf, 1877) * Mikadotrochus caledonicus (Bouchet & Métivier, 1982) * Mikadotrochus gotoi (Anseeuw, 1990) * Mikadotrochus hirasei hirasei (Pilsbry, 1903) ** Mikadotrochus hirasei yamamotoi (A. Yamamoto, 1993), Species inquirenda * Mikadotrochus mikadotrochus Pilsbry * Mikadotrochus salmianus (Rolle, 1887) ;Species brought into synonymy : * Mikadotrochus amabilis Bayer, 1963: synonym of Perotrochus amabilis (Bayer, 1963) * Mikadotrochus anseeuwi Kanazawa & Y. Goto, 1991: synonym of Perotrochus anseeuwi Kanazawa & Y. Goto, 1991 * Mikadotrochus deforgesi B. Métivier, 1990: synonym of Perotrochus deforgesi Métivier, 1990 * Mikadotrochus oishii T. Shikama, 1973: synonym of Perotrochus oishii (Shikama, 1973) * Mikadotrochus schmalzi T. Shikama, 1961: synonym of Mikadotrochus salmianus (Rolle, 1899) ==References== == Further reading == * Williams, S.T., Karube, S. & Ozawa, T. (2008) Molecular systematics of Vetigastropoda: Trochidae, Turbinidae and Trochoidea redefined. Zoologica Scripta 37, 483–506 Category:Pleurotomariidae Category:Gastropod genera Category:Taxa named by Wassili Adolfovitch Lindholm
title: Mikadotrochus
